com.samsung.spen.settings

Class SettingTextInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.spen.settings.SettingTextInfo

extends java.lang.Object
    The class for setting information about the text.
    Since:
    S-Pen SDK 2.1

    • Method Detail

      • setTextStyle

        public void setTextStyle(int nStyle)
        Set the style of the text to change.
        Parameters:
        nStyle - Text style (can be any combination of each style)
        - SObjectText.SAMM_TEXT_STYLE_NONE (no text style found)
        - SObjectText.SAMM_TEXT_STYLE_BOLD (text style - bold)
        - SObjectText.SAMM_TEXT_STYLE_ITALIC (text style - italic)
        - SObjectText.SAMM_TEXT_STYLE_UNDERLINE (text style - underline)
        Multiple styles can be set. (SObjectText.SAMM_TEXT_STYLE_BOLD | SObjectText.SAMM_TEXT_STYLE_ITALIC | ... )
        It the specified style is invalid, the style is set as SObjectText.SAMM_TEXT_STYLE_NONE.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • getTextStyle

        public int getTextStyle()
        Get the current style of the text.
        Returns:
        The style of the text that is set
        - SObjectText.SAMM_TEXT_STYLE_NONE (no text style found)
        - SObjectText.SAMM_TEXT_STYLE_BOLD (text style - bold)
        - SObjectText.SAMM_TEXT_STYLE_ITALIC (text style - italic)
        - SObjectText.SAMM_TEXT_STYLE_UNDERLINE (text style - underline)
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • setTextColor

        public void setTextColor(int color)
        Set the color of the text to change.
        Parameters:
        color - Text color(ARGB)
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • getTextColor

        public int getTextColor()
        Get the current color of the text.
        Returns:
        The color of the text that is set
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • setTextSize

        public void setTextSize(float textSize)
        Set the width of the normal text to change.
        Parameters:
        textSize - The text size(SObjectText.SAMM_DEFAULT_MIN_TEXTSIZE <= textSize <= SObjectText.SAMM_DEFAULT_MAX_TEXTSIZE)
        It the range of the text size is invalid, the text size is adjusted into the valid range.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • getTextSize

        public float getTextSize()
        Get the current width of the text.
        Returns:
        The text size.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • setTextFont

        public void setTextFont(java.lang.String textFont)
        Set the font name of the text to change. If the specified font name is invalid, the font name is set to null.
        Parameters:
        textFont - The font name of the text
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • getTextFont

        public java.lang.String getTextFont()
        Get the current font name of the text.
        Returns:
        The font name of the text
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • getTextAlignment

        public int getTextAlignment()
        Gets the horizontal alignment option for text strings.
        Returns:
        Text horizontal alignment option
        - SAMMLibConstants.SAMM_ALIGN_NORMAL (Left align text - horizontal)
        - SAMMLibConstants.SAMM_ALIGN_CENTER (Center align text - horizontal)
        - SAMMLibConstants.SAMM_ALIGN_OPPOSITE (Right align text - horizontal)
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2

      • setTextAlign

        public boolean setTextAlign(int hAlign)
        Sets the horizontal alignment option for text strings. (May not be available to use in applications that do not support text alignment.)
        Parameters:
        Text - horizontal alignment option
        - SAMMLibConstants.SAMM_ALIGN_NORMAL (Left align text - horizontal)
        - SAMMLibConstants.SAMM_ALIGN_CENTER (Center align text - horizontal)
        - SAMMLibConstants.SAMM_ALIGN_OPPOSITE (Right align text - horizontal)
        Returns:
        Returns False if not a valid option
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2
